task_prefix: Letter recognition dataset where the objective is to identify black-and-white rectangular pixel displays as one of the 26 capital letters in the English alphabet. Character images were based on 20 different fonts with random distortions to produce 20,000 unique stimuli. Each stimulus was converted into 16 primitive numerical attributes using statistical moments and edge counts. Each example contains 16 features. Optical character recognition (OCR) for identifying capital letters from pixel displays. Applications include document digitization.

column_descriptions.Horizontal position of box: Horizontal position of the containing box (integer)
column_descriptions.Vertical position of box: Vertical position of the containing box (integer)
column_descriptions.Width of box: Width of the containing box in pixels (integer)
column_descriptions.Height of box: Height of the containing box in pixels (integer)
column_descriptions.Total number of on pixels: Total count of pixels that are 'on' in the bounding box (integer)
column_descriptions.Mean x of on pixels in box: Mean x coordinate of all 'on' pixels in the box (integer)
column_descriptions.Mean y of on pixels in box: Mean y coordinate of all 'on' pixels in the box (integer)
column_descriptions.Mean x variance: Mean x variance of the pixel distribution (integer)
column_descriptions.Mean y variance: Mean y variance of the pixel distribution (integer)
column_descriptions.Mean x y correlation: Mean correlation between x and y coordinates (integer)
column_descriptions.Mean of x * x * y: Mean value of x squared times y (integer)
column_descriptions.Mean of x * y * y: Mean value of x times y squared (integer)
column_descriptions.Mean edge count left to right: Mean count of edges from left to right (integer)
column_descriptions.Correlation of x-ege with y: Correlation between x-edge count and y coordinate (integer)
column_descriptions.Mean edge count bottom to top: Mean count of edges from bottom to top (integer)
column_descriptions.Correlation of y-ege with x: Correlation between y-edge count and x coordinate (integer)

class_description: Classes: 'A' (Letter A), 'B' (Letter B), 'C' (Letter C), 'D' (Letter D), 'E' (Letter E), 'F' (Letter F), 'G' (Letter G), 'H' (Letter H), 'I' (Letter I), 'J' (Letter J), 'K' (Letter K), 'L' (Letter L), 'M' (Letter M), 'N' (Letter N), 'O' (Letter O), 'P' (Letter P), 'Q' (Letter Q), 'R' (Letter R), 'S' (Letter S), 'T' (Letter T), 'U' (Letter U), 'V' (Letter V), 'W' (Letter W), 'X' (Letter X), 'Y' (Letter Y), 'Z' (Letter Z)
